title: 【活動】週四法語角French Lunch Hour尚有名額，歡迎加入！
author: 呂岳芳
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 語言中心 - 呂岳芳 - carollu@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8905497
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【活動】週四法語角French Lunch Hour尚有名額，歡迎加入！
日期： Thu, 16 May 2024 09:32:06 +0800
附檔： 112-2 FLH - Poster.png (704 KB)   
【French Corner】實體活動French Lunch Hour尚有名額，歡迎隨時加入！
󠀠
5/16本日中午的場次與接下來的場次都歡迎隨時加入！
󠀠
提供點心及飲料｜Snacks and beverage are served
可報名&隨時加入｜Sign-up and walk-in participation are both welcome!
可認證跨域自主學習時數1小時｜1 hour of NDHU Interdisplinary Self-learning credits
󠀠 
󠀠󠀠
★時間／Time
週四中午 Thursday noon 12:15~13:15
★地點／Venue
人社三館B111 H.S. Building III, B111
★主持人／Host
Maxime Terrenne 司馬太
󠀠
Bonjour! Are you trying to learn French and want to know more about French culture? Here's where you should look!
This semester, Language Center presents 10 sessions of French Lunch Hour for those who would like to learn more about French customs, language, cultures and traditions!
Join our French Lunch Hour every Thursday and have fun with our French teaching assistant Maxime!
(The sessions will be mainly conducted in Chinese and English, along with French.)

French Lunch Hour由法國實習助教Maxime分享法國文化與基礎法語入門知識，對法國語言及文化有興趣的同學不要錯過！本活動以中文及英文為主，輔以法文進行。  
對法國文化風情有興趣的朋友，歡迎跟我們的法國助教Maxime一起享受悠閒午間時光！
󠀠
